author: The Linux Foundation
description:
The mobile industry is changing fast. For years, iOS and Android with GMS dominated the landscape, but more than 2 billion devices now run on other platforms like HarmonyOS, Fire OS, and non-GMS Android.

LF Research report, Expanding the Vision for the Mobile Industry, highlights how cross-platform development and open source initiatives like Open Mobile Hub (OMH) can unlock more choice, innovation, and productivity for developers and enterprises worldwide.

The future of mobile is open, flexible, and interoperable. Are you ready to expand your vision?

#OpenSource #MobileDevelopment #LinuxFoundation
title: Expanding the Vision for the Mobile Industry
